title: The Brilliant Son of God Glorified in the Dark
description:
I made a video about the transfiguration earlier in the week. https://youtu.be/z_CN5tUTCjk

WE are separated from this story for deep reasons. Most of the Bible reads heard this story more directly although the core of Jesus' ministry and mission is always disruptive to us.
